mapper.select: SELECT d.project_name, d.repo_name, d.owner_username, LISTAGG(e.ename, ', '), d.current_stage FROM dev_repo d JOIN project_member p ON d.id = p.dev_repo_id join users u ON p.user_id = u.id JOIN emp e ON u.empno = e.empno GROUP BY d.project_name, d.repo_name, d.owner_username, d.current_stage OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT d.id) FROM dev_repo d JOIN project_member p ON d.id = p.dev_repo_id join users u ON p.user_id = u.id JOIN emp e ON u.empno = e.empno
